biotools.summary:
A Repository of Experimentally Characterized O-Glycoproteins to Facilitate Studies on O-Glycosylation.
Numerous studies on cancer, biopharmaceuticals, and clinical trials have necessitated comprehensive and precise analysis of protein O-glycosylation. However, the lack of updated and convenient databases deters the storage and utilization of emerging O-glycoprotein data.
